name: address1
description: The employee's first address line.

name: address2
description: The employee's second address line.

name: age
description: The employee's age. To change age, update dateOfBirth field.

name: bestEmail
description: The employee's work email if set, otherwise their home email.

name: birthday
description: The employee's month and day of birth. To change birthday, update dateOfBirth field.

name: city
description: The employee's city.

name: country
description: The employee's country.

name: dateOfBirth
description: The date the employee was born.

name: department
description: The employee's CURRENT department.

name: division
description: The employee's CURRENT division.

name: eeo
description: The employee's EEO job category. These are defined by the U.S. Equal Employment Opportunity Commission.

name: employeeNumber
description: Employee number (assigned by your company).

name: employmentHistoryStatus
description: The employee's CURRENT employment status. Options are customized by account.

name: ethnicity
description: The employee's ethnicity.

name: exempt
description: The FLSA employee exemption code (Exempt or Non-exempt).

name: firstName
description: The employee's first name.

name: flsaCode
description: The employee's FLSA code (Exempt or Non-exempt).

name: fullName1
description: The employee's first and last name. (e.g., John Doe). Read only.

name: fullName2
description: The employee's last and first name. (e.g., Doe, John). Read only.

name: fullName3
description: The employee's full name and their preferred name. (e.g., Doe, John Quentin (JDog)). Read only.

name: fullName4
description: The employee's full name without their preferred name, last name first. (e.g., Doe, John Quentin). Read only.

name: fullName5
description: The employee's full name without their preferred name, first name first. (e.g., John Quentin Doe). Read only.

name: displayName
description: The employee's name displayed in a format configured by the user. Read only.

name: gender
description: The employee's gender (Male or Female).

name: hireDate
description: The date the employee was hired.

name: homeEmail
description: The employee's home email address.

name: homePhone
description: The employee's home phone number.

name: id
description: The employee ID automatically assigned by BambooHR. Read only.

name: jobTitle
description: The CURRENT value of the employee's job title, updating this field will create a new row in position history.

name: lastChanged
description: The date and time that the employee record was last changed.

name: lastName
description: The employee's last name.

name: location
description: The employee's CURRENT location.

name: maritalStatus
description: The employee's marital status (Single, Married, or Domestic Partnership).

name: middleName
description: The employee's middle name.

name: mobilePhone
description: The employee's mobile phone number.

name: payChangeReason
description: The reason for the employee's last pay rate change.

name: payGroup
description: The custom pay group that the employee belongs to.

name: payGroupId
description: The ID value corresponding to the pay group that an employee belongs to.

name: payRate
description: The employee's CURRENT pay rate (e.g., $8.25).

name: payRateEffectiveDate
description: The day the most recent change was made.

name: payType
description: The employee's CURRENT pay type. ie: "hourly","salary","commission","exception hourly","monthly","weekly","piece rate","contract","daily","pro rata".

name: payPer
description: The employee's CURRENT pay per. ie: "Hour", "Day", "Week", "Month", "Quarter", "Year".

name: paidPer
description: The employee's CURRENT pay per. ie: "Hour", "Day", "Week", "Month", "Quarter", "Year".

name: payPeriod
description: The employee's CURRENT pay period. ie: "Daily", "Weekly", "Every other week", "Twice a month", "Monthly", "Quarterly", "Twice a year", "Yearly".

name: includeInPayroll
description: Should employee be included in payroll (Yes or No)

name: preferredName
description: The employee's preferred name.

name: ssn
description: The employee's Social Security number.

name: sin
description: The employee's Canadian Social Insurance Number.

name: state
description: The employee's state/province.

name: stateCode
description: The 2 character abbreviation for the employee's state (US only). Read only.

name: status
description: The employee's employee status (Active or Inactive).

name: supervisor
description: The employeeï¿½s CURRENT supervisor. Read only.

name: supervisorId
description: The 'employeeNumber' of the employee's CURRENT supervisor. Read only.

name: supervisorEId
description: The ID of the employee's CURRENT supervisor. Read only.

name: terminationDate
description: The date the employee was terminated.

name: workEmail
description: The employee's work email address.

name: workPhone
description: The employee's work phone number, without extension.

name: workPhonePlusExtension
description: The employee's work phone and extension. Read only.

name: workPhoneExtension
description: The employee's work phone extension (if any).

name: zipcode
description: The employee's ZIP code.

name: isPhotoUploaded
description: Whether a photo has been uploaded for the employee. Read only.

name: rehireDate
description: The date the employee was rehired.

name: standardHoursPerWeek
description: The number of hours the employee works in a standard week.

name: bonusDate
description: The date of the last bonus.

name: bonusAmount
description: The amount of the most recent bonus.

name: bonusReason
description: The reason for the most recent bonus.

name: bonusComment
description: Comment about the most recent bonus.

name: commissionDate
description: The date of the last commission.

name: commisionDate
description: This field name contains a typo, and exists for backwards compatibility.

name: commissionAmount
description: The amount of the most recent commission.

name: commissionComment
description: Comment about the most recent commission.
